oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic production: does it enhance the health-promoting compounds in berries?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anttonen, Mikko
Karjalainen, Reijo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have analyzed phenolic compounds from organically and conventionally grown blackcurrants and strawberries to test the idea if organically grown berries contain a higher amount of health-promoting phenolic compounds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anttonen, Mikko and Karjalainen, Reijo (2007) Organic production: does it enhance the health-promoting compounds in berries? In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 3 (1), p. 13.
